sleeping.how: Do you want to sleep? Come to the Sleeping Zone and we'll give you an air mattress to rest all the time you need :zzz:
sleeping.when: You can rest in the Sleeping Zone whenever you need, but you can only get an air mattress until 2AM.
sleeping.where: The Sleeping Zone will be located in the A3 building (both floors) and the second floor of the A4 building.

checkin.how: Come to the Check-in Zone with your ID and we'll give you your accreditation to join HackUPC 2019! :parrot:
checkin.when:
The check-in will be open from 4PM to 6:30PM on Friday 11th.:watch:
 If you are late no worries, there will be a Late Check-in after the Opening ceremony in the InfoDesk.
checkin.where: Check-in is located between A5 and A6 buildings :building_construction:

showers.how: You will need to have towel and soap! You know how to shower, right? :blush:
showers.when: Showers are open from 9:15AM to 11:00AM and from 5:00PM to 7:00PM on Saturday. Please don't forget to shower!
showers.where: Showers are on the university gym: https://g.page/diagonal_sports_fitness_club?share
